title: Integrated geophysical Investigation for gold mineralization potential over southern parts of Kebbi state and its Environs, northwestern Nigeria
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): K.A. Salako, A.A. Adetona, A.A. Rafiu, A.I. Augie, M.O. Jimoh, A. Alkali, R.A. Muriana, J.O. Lawrence
